TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MediaPlayer extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable
type MediaPlayer = class inherit Animatable interface DUCE.IResource

summary.span: 为绘图提供媒体播放功能。

span.span: Provides media playback for drawings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管可以在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]中声明此类的实例，但不能在不使用代码的情况下加载和播放其媒体。Although you can declare an instance of this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot load and play its media without using code. 若要仅在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中播放媒体，请使用 。To play media in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] only, use a . 此外，如果在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中声明实例，则唯一可行的用途是填充 属性的属性元素语法。Also, if you declare an instance in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the only practical use is to fill property element syntax for the property. 使用应用程序分发媒体时，不可将媒体文件用作项目资源。When distributing media with your application, you cannot use a media file as a project resource. 在项目文件中，必须将媒体类型设置为 `Content`，并将 `CopyToOutputDirectory` 设置为 `PreserveNewest` 或 `Always`。In your project file, you must instead set the media type to `Content` and set `CopyToOutputDirectory` to `PreserveNewest` or `Always`. 可用于两种不同的模式，具体取决于驱动播放机：独立模式或时钟模式。 can be used in two different modes, depending on what is driving the player: independent mode or clock mode. 在独立模式下， 类似于图像，通过 方法打开的媒体用于驱动播放。In independent mode, the is analogous to an image and the media opened through the method drives playback. 在时钟模式下，可以将 视为动画的目标，因此它将在计时树中具有相应的 和 项来控制播放。In Clock mode, the can be thought of as a target for an animation, and thus it will have corresponding and entries in the Timing tree which controls playback. 有关媒体模式的详细信息，请参阅[多媒体概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview)。For more information on media modes, see the [Multimedia Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview). 与 不同，因为它不是可以直接添加到应用程序 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 的控件。 is different from a in that it is not a control that can be added directly to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of an application. 若要显示使用 加载的媒体，必须使用 或 。To display media loaded using , a or must be used. ## Examples [如何：使用 System.windows.media.videodrawing> 播放媒体How to: Play Media using a VideoDrawing](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-play-media-using-a-videodrawing)

summary.span: 获取或设置左右扬声器音量之间的平衡。

span.span: Gets or sets the balance between the left and right speaker volumes.

value.span: 介于 -1 到 1 范围内的左右扬声器之间的音量比。

span.span: The ratio of volume across the left and right speakers in a range between -1 and 1.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值-1 表示左侧扬声器的100%，1表示右侧扬声器的100%。A value of -1 represents 100% of the left side speakers and 1 represents 100% of the right side speakers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::MediaClock ^ Clock { System::Windows::Media::MediaClock ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::MediaClock ^ value); };
member this.Clock : System.Windows.Media.MediaClock with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与要播放的 关联的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the associated with the to be played.

value.span: 与要播放的 关联的时钟。

span.span: The clock associated with the to be played.

value.span: 默认值为 null。

span.span: The default is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置此属性，可将 设置为时钟驱动，并将使用计时引擎，使播放机处于时钟模式。Setting this property tells the to be clock driven and will utilize the timing engine, placing the player in Clock mode. 任何正在播放的媒体都将停止，并打开与新时钟关联的 。Any media that is playing is stopped and the associated with the new clock is opened. 当播放机处于时钟模式时，使用 或调用 、或 方法查找将引发 。When the player is in clock mode, seeking using or calling the , , or methods will throw an . 仅当播放机 为 null 时，这些操作才可用。These operations are only available when the player is null.

summary.span: 使此实例成为指定 的深层副本。

span.span: Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified .

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 方法调用，不应在代码中直接调用，除非在重写此方法时调用基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用 ，而不是直接调用此方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values. 请注意，如果这些属性包含资源引用或数据绑定，则在尝试冻结对象并将引发 将失败。Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an . 此方法由 方法调用，不应在代码中直接调用，除非在重写此方法时调用基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的冻结副本，请调用 ，而不是直接调用此方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置媒体的播放速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the ratio of speed that media is played at.

value.span: 由 0 与最大双精度数值之间的值所表示的媒体播放速率。

span.span: The ratio of speed that media is played back represented by a value between 0 and the largest double value.

value.span: 默认值为1.0。

span.span: The default is 1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 小于1的值产生比正常播放慢，而大于1的值产生比正常播放快。Values less than one yield slower than normal playback while values greater than one yields faster than normal playback. 如果播放机具有关联的 ，则不允许设置 。If the player has an associated , setting is not allowed. 计时引擎驱动媒体播放时无法设置 。 cannot be set while the timing engine drives media playback. 当不 `1` 时，不保证音频播放。Audio playback is not guaranteed when is not `1`. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 通常不在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中使用。Not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
